channel.title: Experiments on Renzo C. Silva
channel.description: Recent content in Experiments on Renzo C. Silva

item.title: Contact
item.description: HOME - What I am up to? I have been involved in several data projects, but most of them won’t see the light of the day. There are a few things though, mostly on the personal side, that I am eager to share - here you’ll find a list of such projects. Hill Charts Summary: I have used this since the first day I came to know it via Basecamp - Hill Charts.
